entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
